subject: Create CompanionClient with WebSocket Connection
description:
Implement CompanionClient with WebSocket connection using tokio-tungstenite. Support graceful degradation for local mode, fail-fast for remote mode. Add send_event() method. Add futures-util dependency.

Files:
- Modify: maestro-cli/src/claude/companion.rs
- Modify: maestro-cli/Cargo.toml

Expected: Test passes for client disabled when env missing
